p: Furthermore, the self-healable UPy molecules are expected to crosslink between the polymer chains as well as with Si particles to form a more stable 3D network, which will allow it to accommodate the volume expansion of Si more effectively. The self-healable property of the PAU- g-PEG polymer binder can also efficiently restore structural deterioration which has occurred during the charge/discharge process, while maintaining the physical stability of the electrodes.
